auth.banned: Your account has been banned. Reason: :reason
home.title: Game Translations
home.alpha_banner: This project is in alpha - expect bugs and missing features.
home.hero_description: The open-source translation mod for Unity games. Generate translations with local AI, download community translations, or share your own. Works offline, syncs online.
home.mod_desc: Install the mod in any Unity game. Configure everything from the in-game overlay, no file editing required.
home.mod_feature_5: Smart merge keeps your local changes
home.website_desc: Download quality translations from the community. Upload and share your own. Vote for the best ones.
home.website_feature_2: Upload with one click from the mod
games.no_translations: No translations yet for this game.
upload.title: Upload Translation
upload.notes_placeholder: Any additional information about this translation...
upload.update_info: Update: You are updating your previous translation
upload.new_info: New: First translation for this file
upload.notes_desc: Describe your translation: what you changed, quality notes, known issues...
upload.please_select_game: Please select a game from the search results
upload.update_your_translation: You are updating your existing translation
upload.update_description: Your previous version will be replaced with this new file.
upload.branch_description: Your translation will appear as a branch contribution. The Main owner can merge your work.
upload.update_branch_description: Your branch version will be replaced with this new file.
upload.review_changes_desc: Compare your local file with the online version and merge manually
profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.name_help: Letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens only. 2-50 characters.
profile.email_managed: Email is managed by your :provider account.
profile.gdpr_info: Under GDPR, you have the right to export or delete your personal data at any time.
profile.delete_confirm_text: This action cannot be undone. Your account will be anonymized.
profile.delete_warning_translations: Your translations will be kept but shown as from "[Deleted]"
profile.delete_warning_votes: Your votes and reports will be deleted
profile.delete_name_mismatch: The name you entered does not match your account name.
report.title: Report Translation
admin.ban_confirm: Are you sure you want to ban this user?
admin.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this translation?
footer.tagline: The open-source translation mod for Unity games.
docs.title: Documentation
docs.what_is_desc: UnityGameTranslator is an open-source translation mod for Unity games. It combines local AI translation with community-powered translations, all configurable from an in-game overlay.
docs.feature_local: Local AI with Ollama - no internet, no API costs
docs.feature_sync: Auto-sync and smart merge with updates
docs.how_to_know: How to know your game type:
docs.download_ugt_desc: Download the latest release matching your mod loader and extract to:
docs.first_launch_desc: On first launch, a setup wizard guides you through configuration. Choose online or offline mode, set your hotkey, and optionally configure Ollama.
docs.enable_ai_desc: By default, the mod uses cached or downloaded translations. To enable live AI:
docs.edit_config: Enable in the settings overlay or set in config.json:
docs.config_desc: Configure via the in-game overlay (F10) or edit config.json:
docs.online_sync_desc: The mod can automatically search for translations when you launch a game. Enable 'Check updates on start' in settings to get notified when new versions are available.
docs.sharing_desc: Upload your translations directly from the mod. Click 'Login' in the overlay, enter the code on this website, and you can upload with one click.
docs.upload_desc: Share your translations with the community.
docs.merging_desc: When you download an update, the mod intelligently merges it with your local changes using 3-way merge. Your modifications are preserved while new translations are added.
docs.uuid_info: Each translation file has a unique UUID. When you fork and re-upload a translation, the website automatically links it to the original, preserving the lineage.
docs.mod_not_loading_desc: Make sure you installed the correct version (BepInEx 5/6, Mono/IL2CPP) for your game.
docs.ollama_not_translating_desc: Check that Ollama is running and the model is downloaded. Use the 'Test connection' button in settings.
docs.overlay_not_showing_desc: Press your configured hotkey (default F10). If it conflicts with the game, change it in config.json.
docs.sync_not_working_desc: Make sure 'Online mode' is enabled in settings. Check your internet connection.
docs.queue_stuck_desc: Set "debug_ollama": true in config to see detailed logs.
auth.login_to_vote: Please log in to vote on translations.
auth.login_to_report: Please log in to report inappropriate content.
auth.login_to_upload: Please log in to upload translations.
my_translations.title: My Translations
my_translations.empty: You haven't uploaded any translations yet.
cookies.message: This site uses essential cookies for authentication and session management. No tracking or advertising cookies.
legal.name: Name
legal.intellectual_property_text: The UnityGameTranslator mod is open source and available under its respective license on GitHub. User-submitted translations remain the property of their authors. Game names and images belong to their respective owners.
legal.privacy_intro: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use UnityGameTranslator.
legal.data_collected_intro: When you log in via OAuth (Google, GitHub, Discord, Twitch), we collect:
legal.data_provider_id: Your unique ID from the login provider
legal.data_user_content: When you use the site, we also store:
legal.usage_display: Display your name and avatar next to your contributions
legal.usage_contact: Contact you if necessary (e.g., about your reports)
legal.usage_moderation: Moderate content and enforce our terms
legal.data_sharing_text: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties. Your email is never publicly displayed. Only your display name and avatar are visible to other users.
legal.data_retention_text: Your data is kept as long as your account is active. You can request deletion of your account and associated data at any time by contacting us.
legal.cookies_text: We only use essential cookies required for the site to function:
legal.your_rights_intro: Under the GDPR, you have the right to:
legal.rights_contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:
legal.updates_text: We may update this policy occasionally. Significant changes will be announced on the site.
legal.terms_acceptance_text: By using UnityGameTranslator, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use the site.
legal.service_description_text: UnityGameTranslator is a free platform for sharing game translation files. Users can upload, download, and rate community-made translations for Unity games.
legal.content_ownership: You retain ownership of your translations
legal.content_license: You grant us a non-exclusive license to host and distribute your content
legal.content_responsibility: You are responsible for ensuring you have the right to share the content
legal.prohibited_intro: You may not upload or share:
legal.moderation_text: We reserve the right to remove any content and suspend accounts that violate these terms without prior notice.
legal.disclaimer_text: Translations are provided by community members. We do not guarantee their quality, accuracy, or compatibility with any game. Use at your own risk.
legal.liability_text: UnityGameTranslator is provided "as is" without warranty. We are not liable for any damages resulting from the use of the site or downloaded translations.
legal.termination_text: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms. You may also delete your account at any time by contacting us.
legal.governing_law_text: These terms are governed by French law. Any disputes will be subject to the jurisdiction of French courts.
merge_preview.title: Merge Preview
merge_preview.no_differences: No differences found between local and online versions.
merge_preview.instructions: Click to select a version. Double-click to edit.
merge_preview.error_no_local_file: Local file not found. Please go back and re-upload your file.
merge_preview.error_invalid_json: Invalid JSON format in local file.
merge_preview.error_file_not_found: Translation file not found on server.
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.no_branches_desc: When other users contribute to your translation, they will appear here.
dashboard.main_not_found: The Main translation for this lineage no longer exists.
dashboard.convert_to_fork_desc: Convert your branch to an independent translation (Fork). You will become the Main owner of your own lineage.
dashboard.convert_warning: This action is irreversible. Your translation will no longer be linked to the original Main. You must download and replace your local file.
dashboard.convert_confirm: Are you sure you want to convert this branch to a Fork? This action cannot be undone.
dashboard.convert_instructions: After conversion, replace the translations.json file in your mod folder with the downloaded file.
dashboard.not_a_branch: This translation is not a branch.
progress.quality_tooltip: Quality score based on translation source (Human > Validated > AI)
rating.not_main_owner: Only the Main owner can rate branches.
